summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the unpaid assessments levied for the improvement of 10th Avenue Northeast and other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 3284, and for the improvement of 10th Avenue Northeast, and other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 3285, on certain property which has been deeded for street purposes.
